name: クリア
message: "Umm, excuse me! Do you have a moment?!"
When I see who he's waving to, I nearly have a heart attack.

name: クリア
message: "Excuse me, sir! I have something I'd like to ask youuuu!"
Oh fuck! Fuuuuck! I have to stop him!

name: クリア
message: "We're hoping to get into the tower over there. You wouldn't happen to know how to do that, would you?"

name: チンピラＡ
message: "Tower? You better show a little respect before you start askin' questions, buddy."

name: チンピラＢ
message: "You fucking with us? Hand over whatever money you got."

name: クリア
message: "Money? Oh no. I don't share money with people I've only just met."
One of the punks looks ready to explode. He raises his fist―
They're gonna beat the shit outta him!

name: クリア
message:
"Noooooooo fighting!"

Clear suddenly starts windmilling his arms!
Somehow, one of his fists lands on the closer man's forehead. He goes down like a sack of gravel.
Another gangster appears at the end of the alley.
The newcomer glances at the man on the ground, then up at us.

name: 兄貴
message: "I see. Hey! This guy? He's one of mine. Can't have people punching out my guys."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear, don't say another word. ...Look, everything just got a little out of hand. We're really sorry."
I tug on Clear's arm and bow to the yakuza.
But, well... I guess it's a little too late.

name: 兄貴
message: "We're way beyond apologies, kid. We've got an image to uphold... see?!"
Suddenly, he walks up and shoves me in the chest. I stumble back into Clear.

name: 兄貴
message: "The fuck? Master? What are you, his dog?"
